page.title: 15MEDIA - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer, like most other areas and towns in the country is served by both national and local television and radio stations. In Stranraer the following television stations can be viewed:- { BBC1 (Scotland), BBC2, ITV Channel 4 and the 'local' ITV channel,{Border which is based in Carlisle. All the national radio programmes can be picked up and there is also a local station called{BBC Radio Solway}which is based in Dumfries. There are two local newspapers printed weekly with news and views about the area.{The Galloway Gazette is printed in Newton Stewart and{The {Wigtown Free Press}is edited and printed in Stranraer. Other media sources in the town include, three video shops, a{library and several magazine and book shops.
